Description of incident: The CMS experienced 13 breaches between September 23, 2009 and December 31, 2011.  The CMS failed to notify beneficiaries of seven of the breaches in a timely manner.  The HHS's Office of the Inspector General (OIG) also alleges that the notifications mailed to beneficiaries did not disclose what type of information had been exposed, the date the breach occurred, or how CMS was working to prevent future breaches.
